sn22.12:1.4: “Mendicants, form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness are impermanent.
sn22.12:1.5: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple grows disillusioned with form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
sn22.12:1.6: Being disillusioned, desire fades away. When desire fades away they’re freed. When they’re freed, they know they’re freed.
sn22.12:1.7: They understand: ‘Rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.’”
